entries.description: Add keepalive-time Konnectivity setting + set keepalive to 1m by default.
Allow k8s version upgrade for clusters with non-amd64 nodes & Canal CNI and IPVS for all k8s versions.
Fix OpenStack cloud provider tenant to project fields migration.
Prevent DataVolumes from being Garbage Collected with KubeVirt version >=1.55.0.
Persist annotations when upgrading a cluster.
Fix a bug that was resulting in outdated Project and/or Cluster labels in metering reports.
Unblock etcd backup controller's reconciliation loop in case `defaultDestination` field was missing on Seed CR.
